Installing PyWFOM¶

System Requirements¶

  • Windows 10 or Linux

  • Python 3.5+

w/ PIP¶

The easiest way to install pywfom is through the Python Package Manager, PIP

pip install pywfom

From Source¶

pywfom's Source Code is hosted on Github.

git clone https://github.com/ryan-byrne/pywfom.git
cd pywfom
python setup.py install
